text: On the Milky Road (; ) is a 2016 Bosnia and Herzegovina Serbian Mexican American British Argentine war fantasy drama movie directed by Emir Kusturica and was based on the segment of the anthology movie Words with Gods. It stars Emir Kusturica, Monica Bellucci, Sloboda Mićalović and Predrag Manojlović. ==Other websites== * * Category:2016 fantasy movies Category:2016 drama movies Category:2010s war movies Category:Bosnia and Herzegovina movies Category:Serbian movies Category:Mexican drama movies Category:Mexican fantasy movies Category:American war movies Category:American fantasy movies Category:American drama movies Category:British war movies Category:British fantasy movies Category:British drama movies Category:Argentine fantasy movies Category:Argentine drama movies Category:Movies directed by Emir Kusturica Category:Movies set in Bosnia and Herzegovina
title: On the Milky Road
